Lunch will not be provided at the symposium, but there will be coffee and pastries available at registration and for the breaks throughout the day.

There are many eateries within walking distance for lunch. Olives Cafe and Coupa Cafe are very close to Hauck Auditorium. There are many other options at Tressider Marketplace including: Treehouse, CoHo, Subway, Panda Express, The Axe & Palm, Starbucks, and Jamba Juice. Arrillaga Dining Hall serves breakfast, lunch and dinner within their working hours.
